items.title: Google has been crushing it with AI this year in this overlooked way
items.description: Waymo, the Alphabet-backed robotaxi startup, has been on a tear. Soon it could be worth $100 billion.

items.title: The price of the measles: It costs at least $16,200 every time someone gets them.
items.description: As measles outbreaks increase and more people contract the disease, the U.S. healthcare system faces a costly bill.

items.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
items.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

items.title: Is a new OpenAI deal what Amazon’s stock needs to finally come alive?
